thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ESI Q3 Revenue $110.8 Million Versus $33.8 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ESI Q3 Revenue $110.8 Million Versus $33.8 Million
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Electro Scientific Industries Inc :
* ESI ANNOUNCES STRONG THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.99 * Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.94 * Q3 REVENUE $110.8 MILLION VERSUS $33.8 MILLION * Q3 REVENUE VIEW $85 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.55 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q4 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.75 TO $0.95 * SEES Q4 2018 REVENUE $95 MILLION TO $110 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
